text.section: This section does not apply to a raffle or other game of chance that a charitable organization holds in a county under the laws applicable to the county.

section.section:
If a person, in connection with a written charitable solicitation, offers a contest, sweepstakes, or other promotion, the person shall disclose in writing to each offeree:
the manufacturer's suggested retail price or comparable retail price of each prize offered;
the conditions to be met to receive a prize; and
that to receive the prize offered in the promotion the offeree may not be required to:
buy goods or services;
pay money; or
submit to a promotion.

text.section: Each disclosure required under this section shall appear on the first page of the prize notification document.
